wikitext.*:
[[File:The Hobbit - An Unexpected Journey - Extended Edition - Blu-ray cover.jpg|250px|thumb|right|Blu-ray cover of the Extended Edition{{sequence |prev=[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)|The Return of the King Extended Edition]] |next=[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug (extended edition)|The Desolation of Smaug Extended Edition]] |list=The Hobbit Extended Edition
An Unexpected Journey }}]] '''''The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey'' (extended edition)''' is an extended version of ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]''. It has 13 minutes of additional footage added back into the film (bringing its total running time up to 182 minutes), as well as multiple documentaries about the making of the film as supplements. [[File:The Hobbit - An Unexpected Journey - Extended Edition - DVD cover.jpg|150px|right|thumb|DVD cover]] ==Special Extended Edition (disc 1)== The first disc contains the extended version of the film with the following audio commentary: * [[Peter Jackson]] and [[Philippa Boyens]] NOTE: The film is split over 2 discs for both the DVD and Blu-ray 3-D editions; the breaking point coming between chapters 20 & 21 (the Blu-ray 3-D edition also contains the regular 2-D Blu-ray version of the film as disc 3). ===New Scenes=== * 4. Mr. Baggins * 21. The Last Homely House ===Extended Scenes=== * 1. Prologue: The Fall of Erebor * 6. "Blunt the Knives" * 17. Rivendell * 18. A Short Rest * 22. The White Council * 26. The Great Goblin ==The Appendices: Part Seven - A Long-Expected Journey: The Chronicles of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' - Part 1 (disc 2)**== * Introduction from Peter Jackson* * "The Journey Back to Middle-earth" Documentary* * "Riddles in the Dark" Documentary* * "An Unexpected Party" Documentary* * "Roast Mutton" Documentary* * "Bastion of the [[Mirkwood|Greenwood]]" Documentary* * "A Short Rest" Documentary* * "Over Hill..." Documentary^ * "... Under Hill" Documentary^ * "Out of the Frying Pan..." Documentary^ * "Return to [[Hobbiton]]" Documentary^ * "The Epic of Scene 88" Documentary^ * "The Battle of [[Moria]]" Documentary^ * "Edge of the [[Rhovanion|Wilderland]]" Documentary^ * "Home Is Behind, the World Ahead" Documentary^ * Credits^ [[File:The Hobbit - An Unexpected Journey - Extended Edition - Blu-ray 3-D cover.jpg|150px|right|thumb|Blu-ray 3-D cover]] ==The Appendices: Part Eight - Return to [[Middle-earth]] (disc 3)^^== * "The Company of [[Thorin]]" Documentaryº ** Assembling the Dwarves ** Thorin, [[Fíli]] & [[Kíli]] ** [[Balin]] & [[Dwalin]] ** [[Óin]] & [[Glóin]] ** [[Dori]], [[Nori]] & [[Ori]] ** [[Bifur]], [[Bofur]] & [[Bombur]] * "Mr. Baggins: The 14th Member" Documentaryº * "[[Durin's Folk]]: Creating the Dwarves" Documentaryº * "The Peoples and Denizens of Middle-earth" Documentaryº ** The Stone [[Trolls]] ** [[Radagast]] the Brown ** [[Orcs#Orcs and Goblins|Goblins]] ** [[Azog]] the Defiler * "Realms of the [[Third Age]]: From [[Bag End]] to [[Goblin-town]]" Documentary^ ** Hobbiton ** [[Rhosgobel]] ** [[Rivendell]] ** The [[Misty Mountains]] ** Goblin-town * "The Songs of ''The Hobbit''" Documentary* * Creditsº NOTE: * - Item is on disc 3 of DVD edition ^ - Item is on disc 4 of DVD edition º - Item is on disc 5 of DVD edition ** - Is actually disc 4 of Blu-ray 3-D edition ^^ - Is actually disc 5 of Blu-ray 3-D edition ==See also== * ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'' * [[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug (extended edition)|''The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug'' (extended edition)]] * [[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies (extended edition)|''The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies'' (extended edition)]] * [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (extended edition)]] * [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (extended edition)]] * [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)]] {{hobbitfilms}} {{title|italics}} [[Category:The Hobbit (film series)]] [[Category:The Hobbit (film series) DVDs]]
